readable.title: 1303727066_23d0f6ed43
readable.content: A dark haired bearded man wearing a turquoise shirt with a yellow peace sign on it . A man wearing a peace sign on his shirt smiles . A man with a peace sign shirt stops to look at something . A smiling bearded man wears a shirt with an orange peace sign The T-shirt worn by the man has a bright orange peace symbol on the back .
